entities.description: Respondents who were unable to cut down or stop using cocaine more than one time in the past 12 months.
Respondents who often wished they could cut down or stop using cocaine in the past 12 months.
Presence of any long-lasting physical health problems caused or worsened by cocaine use in the past 12 months.
Continued use of cocaine despite causing or worsening physical health problems in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates that the respondent was unable to cut down or stop cocaine use more than one time in the past 12 months.
Indicates that the respondent often wished they could cut down or stop using cocaine in the past 12 months.
Relates cocaine use to long-lasting physical health problems caused or worsened by cocaine in the past 12 months.
Indicates the respondent continued to use cocaine despite causing or worsening physical health problems in the past 12 months.
